id="UC4RB_SERVICE_FILE_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" separator="" showaspassword="0" text="Service name/Script Filename" tooltip="When 'service' is chosen: For Windows: name of the service For Unix: script with full path in your init.d folder to call (e.g.: /etc/init.d/sunone) When 'script' is chosen: For Windows and Unix the full path of the script must be specified (e.g.:
